comment: Very cool, and glad to see something compatible with pass. If I had to request a next feature it would have to be editing existing entries.

title: Great App
comment: Does one thing and does it well.  Couldn't ask for a better implementation.

title: Superb
comment: Hands-down the best password manager app for android. Thank you so much for programming this, works pretty good with OpenKeyChain+NFCNeo+Git. There are still a few issues with the search functionality and Git sometimes doesn't work.

title: Nicely done
comment: Not for everyone, but great for me

title: Grossartig!
comment: Mit GIT und pass auf dem Mac habe ich eine perfekte und sichere Passwortverwaltung. Ich liebe es!

title: Nice
comment: A bit complex set up... SSH, GPG, GIT... Only for developer, I think

title: Excellent start
comment: I've been waiting for ages for an android implementation of password-store, and this one is excellent. It does everything I need it to, so any extra features are just gravy.

title: Simple and works well
comment: Just what I had always hoped for as a mobile companion for pass. Paired with the beautiful openkeychain, this app is delightfully simple to use and does all I need when on the go. Would gladly pay a few bucks to support development.
Thank you for the comment. Can you report issues on github or use the report button if you have crashes? It will really help us to improve the application.

I have always stored my passwords like this, but had never heard of pass. When I came to android, I found this app, and I found pass, both of which are delightfully simple and functional. The only thing I miss from this app is that I can't specify where to put the git repo, or choose to use an existing one. I would like this feature because I already have an app which I like for managing my git stuff.

We are working on implementing the multiple repository support, once it is done we will add the external repository feature. The latter feature will become the default option and let the user handle the sync using agit or any cloud sync service.

title: Awesome
comment: Works well, but not only that, it's sleek. Unexpectedly, also supports syncing from any git repo using SSH key auth - real bonus! Cheers for this :)

title: I love it
comment: It needs a random password generator.
Exactly what I was looking for ! Great app I love it !

title: Great initiative!
comment: Nice app! It was really missing.

title: 5 stars for the idea
comment: Was thinking about implementing similar app. Keep up good work

Thanks, more work is indeed required for it to be great ☺. 

BTW, pull requests are welcome!
